item.title: Crescent Moon on 4/6/2005.
item.description: Crescent Moon on 4/6/2005. Taken with the old Canon Digital Rebel XT on the 12-inch Meade LX200.
item.media:description: Crescent Moon on 4/6/2005. Taken with the old Canon Digital Rebel XT on the 12-inch Meade LX200.

item.title: Crescent Moon on 4/6/2005.
item.description: Crescent Moon on 4/6/2005. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel on Meade 12" LX 200. 1/100 sec exposure, ISO 200.
item.media:description: Crescent Moon on 4/6/2005. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel on Meade 12" LX 200. 1/100 sec exposure, ISO 200.

item.title: Eclipse Movie
item.description: 2008-02-20. Click to view a GIF movie of a lunar eclipse. Stills taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT and kit lens.
item.media:description: 2008-02-20. Click to view a GIF movie of a lunar eclipse. Stills taken with Canon Digital Rebel XT and kit lens.

item.title: Total lunar eclipse of 2/21/08 with stars.
item.description: Total lunar eclipse of 2/21/08 with stars. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel with kit lens at about 55 mm; ISO 800, 3 second exposure. Such a long exposure would normally saturate a photo of the full Moon.
item.media:description: Total lunar eclipse of 2/21/08 with stars. Taken with Canon Digital Rebel with kit lens at about 55 mm; ISO 800, 3 second exposure. Such a long exposure would normally saturate a photo of the full Moon.

item.title: Gibbous Moon on 5/12/11.
item.description: Gibbous Moon on 5/12/11. Taken with Meade DSI on the 12-inch Meade LX200.
item.media:description: Gibbous Moon on 5/12/11. Taken with Meade DSI on the 12-inch Meade LX200.

item.title: 10/24/11 Gibbous Moon through red filter.
item.description: Gibbous Moon shot through 80mm APO with red filter over aperture. 10/24/11.
item.media:description: Gibbous Moon shot through 80mm APO with red filter over aperture. 10/24/11.

item.title: Gibbous Moon on 3/10/12.
item.description: Gibbous Moon on 3/10/12. Taken with the Atik 383L CCD on the Meade Apochromatic refractor. About a 0.03 sec exposure.
item.media:description: Gibbous Moon on 3/10/12. Taken with the Atik 383L CCD on the Meade Apochromatic refractor. About a 0.03 sec exposure.

item.title: Detail enhanced close-up.
item.description: 5/16/17. A heavily cratered area of the moon near the terminator. Taken with a Logitech webcam and processed using wavelet transforms.
item.media:description: 5/16/17. A heavily cratered area of the moon near the terminator. Taken with a Logitech webcam and processed using wavelet transforms.

item.title: Moon close-up 5/16/13.
item.description: Moon close-up 5/16/13. Extracted from a Logitech web cam video and processed with wavelet sharpening. The web cam is modified to work at the cassegrain focus of a telescope, in the case the 11-inch Celestron.
item.media:description: Moon close-up 5/16/13. Extracted from a Logitech web cam video and processed with wavelet sharpening. The web cam is modified to work at the cassegrain focus of a telescope, in the case the 11-inch Celestron.

item.title: Moon close-up 5/16/13.
item.description: Close up of Moon extracted from logitech webcam video with some wavelet sharpening. Webcam placed at cassegrain focus of the 11-inch or the 12-inch.
item.media:description: Close up of Moon extracted from logitech webcam video with some wavelet sharpening. Webcam placed at cassegrain focus of the 11-inch or the 12-inch.

item.title: Waxing Crescent on 5/29/17.
item.description: Waxing Crescent on 5/29/17. Taken with the EF75-300 zoom lens (at f/5.6, 300 mm) on the Canon T5i with a 1/200 sec exposure. This lens produces some chromatic aberration. Pixel scale about 2.2 "/pix. Cropped down from original.
item.media:description: Waxing Crescent on 5/29/17. Taken with the EF75-300 zoom lens (at f/5.6, 300 mm) on the Canon T5i with a 1/200 sec exposure. This lens produces some chromatic aberration. Pixel scale about 2.2 "/pix. Cropped down from original.

item.title: Gibbous Moon on 9/5/17.
item.description: Gibbous Moon on 9/5/17. Lunar North is roughly up and West roughly left. Featuring the rayed crater Copernicus (below center), Mare Imbrium (center left), boardered on the East by the Apennine Mountains. The walled plain, Plato, is the dark feature to the top left. 1/80 sec with Canon T5i on the C11.
item.media:description: Gibbous Moon on 9/5/17. Lunar North is roughly up and West roughly left. Featuring the rayed crater Copernicus (below center), Mare Imbrium (center left), boardered on the East by the Apennine Mountains. The walled plain, Plato, is the dark feature to the top left. 1/80 sec with Canon T5i on the C11.

item.title: Moon close-up 9/28/17.
item.description: Moon close-up 9/28/17. Mare Tranquillitatus is the dark region closest to center. The bright rayed crater Proclus is above it. Taken with Canon T5i, 1/800 second exposure, at the Cassegrain focus of either the 11-inch or 12-inch.
item.media:description: Moon close-up 9/28/17. Mare Tranquillitatus is the dark region closest to center. The bright rayed crater Proclus is above it. Taken with Canon T5i, 1/800 second exposure, at the Cassegrain focus of either the 11-inch or 12-inch.

item.title: Waxing crescent on 5/20/18.
item.description: Waxing crescent on 5/20/18. Mare Crisium is the dark oval region to the top right. Lunar N is up and E to left. Taken with Canon T5i in 1920x1080 (S2) format giving about a 28' FOV.
item.media:description: Waxing crescent on 5/20/18. Mare Crisium is the dark oval region to the top right. Lunar N is up and E to left. Taken with Canon T5i in 1920x1080 (S2) format giving about a 28' FOV.

item.title: Gibbous Moon on 5/23/18 with labels.
item.description: Gibbous Moon on 5/23/18 with labels. Lunar north is down and East left (fully inverted). 1/15-sec exposure at ISO 200 with Canon T5i.
item.media:description: Gibbous Moon on 5/23/18 with labels. Lunar north is down and East left (fully inverted). 1/15-sec exposure at ISO 200 with Canon T5i.

item.title: Gibbous Moon on 5/24/18 with labels.
item.description: Gibbous Moon on 5/24/18 with labels. 1/400 sec exposure with ISO 3200 using the Canon T5i on the 11-inch (or 12-inch) telescope.
item.media:description: Gibbous Moon on 5/24/18 with labels. 1/400 sec exposure with ISO 3200 using the Canon T5i on the 11-inch (or 12-inch) telescope.

item.title: Gibbous Moon on 5/24/18 from video.
item.description: Gibbous Moon on 5/24/18. Mare Tranquillitatus is center and Mare Serenitatus is to its right. A high-contrast image created from a 60 fps Canon T5i video taken at 1280x720 format, but panned to extend the field of view. Normally, this mode allows only a ~23' fov, but a ~30' fov is attained here using PIPP and Registax. Wavelet sharpening was applied.
item.media:description: Gibbous Moon on 5/24/18. Mare Tranquillitatus is center and Mare Serenitatus is to its right. A high-contrast image created from a 60 fps Canon T5i video taken at 1280x720 format, but panned to extend the field of view. Normally, this mode allows only a ~23' fov, but a ~30' fov is attained here using PIPP and Registax. Wavelet sharpening was applied.

item.title: GIbbous Moon on 5/24/18 from video #2.
item.description: GIbbous Moon on 5/24/18 from video #2. Similar to previous picture but showing more of the lunar highlands. Tycho is prominant rayed crater at the top left.
item.media:description: GIbbous Moon on 5/24/18 from video #2. Similar to previous picture but showing more of the lunar highlands. Tycho is prominant rayed crater at the top left.

item.title: Gibbous Moon on 10/23/18 from video.
item.description: Gibbous Moon on 10/23/18 from video. Mare Imbrium is the large dark region left of center with the dark walled plane Plato just above it. Frames were grabbed from a 24 fps video with ISO 200 and 1/400 sec exposure per frame. Lunar N is roughly up and E is right.
item.media:description: Gibbous Moon on 10/23/18 from video. Mare Imbrium is the large dark region left of center with the dark walled plane Plato just above it. Frames were grabbed from a 24 fps video with ISO 200 and 1/400 sec exposure per frame. Lunar N is roughly up and E is right.

item.title: Total Lunar Eclipse of 1/20/2019.
item.description: Total Lunar Eclipse of 1/20/2019. This is during totality. A 1.6 sec exposure with the Canon T5i DSLR on a tripod. The 75-300 mm lens was used at approximately full zoom.
item.media:description: Total Lunar Eclipse of 1/20/2019. This is during totality. A 1.6 sec exposure with the Canon T5i DSLR on a tripod. The 75-300 mm lens was used at approximately full zoom.
